Extracted Variables:
- x: number of orders of matcha ice cream
- y: number of orders of orange sorbet

Extracted Constraints:
1. 2x + 4y \leq 600 (constraint on ice cream)
2. 4x + 3y \leq 550 (constraint on water)
3. x \geq 0
4. y \geq 0
5. y \geq 0.15(x + y) (at least 15% of desserts made must be matcha ice cream)

Extracted Objective:
Minimize the total amount of flavouring needed: 2x + 4y
